property.name: Description
property.value: The template is used to describe the tested subject audio, video or visual stimulation during Event-Related Potentials (ERP) experiments.

section.name: Response
section.definition: It describes responses of the person to the stimulation, surroundings,... during the experiment.

property.name: Description
property.definition: A textual description of the response.

property.name: Comment
property.definition: A comment on this specific response.

property.name: Author
property.definition: Who is the author of this response.

property.name: Intensity
property.definition: like the current in case of electrical stimulation.

property.name: Location
property.definition: Describes the site of the response application.

property.name: Modality
property.definition: Visual, acoustic, haptic, electrical, etc. response.

property.name: Repetitions
property.definition: The number of repetitions of the described response.

property.name: ResponseFile
property.definition: The URL to a received response file.
